title: [机械][修正]Ice Breaker—— 无需精准破坏冰块获得冰块（· v·）[1.7~1.8]
author: 西木凛

这个插件是作者的第二个插件<` v '>下面那段话的意思就是让你的服务器里的冰可以用手就可以挖到而不需要附魔'精准'  ( ' w`)
Ever bugged about how you need silk touch to harvest ice? This plugin is for you!Ice breaker is a lightweight plugin that whenever a player breaks ice instead of placing water it drops the ice!
